ProjectTitle: Polylactones as polymers designed for chemical recycling to monomers: catalytic monomer synthesis, polymerization and depolymerization
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/03/2024
Preserving data on an external hard drive is not very safe, please have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
You can also consider data sharing in a repository such as RDR (https://rdr.kuleuven.be/), for more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
